title: Drophack continues.
body:
Hello to all

As along with many others i have been getting dropped hack at high elo diamond level, would like to see some people brought to justice,

i played against these 5 - 

queen gaga
2d over 3d
natedogg holder
mysterise
wreck it rhune

Not naming anybody for the drop but obviously 1 of these people we were winning hard about to close and got dropped with firewall blocked etc. Thinking everytime a drop hack occurs and post a list of names might narrow down the people responsible and right might be able to investigate. Anyway lets stop this!!!

replies.body: Unlucky of you to face them. I'd hate to.

Agreed, naming and shaming is irrelevant when it comes to this, Happens often in low elo to, last 2 ranked games, dced with firewalls and unable to rejoin. Put me into low priority queue. Let's bring every one of these bastards to justice.
Not really shaming as he's not specifying who did it. Unless you are talking about the idea.

If you get drop hacked don't close the client or reconnect, just keep clicking the base. It still registers as you playing and the match wont drop + you'll be the first one back so free farm and turrets.
Lets be honest, if they drop hack most likely the games gone.
how on earth does that work XD
You forgot to say nerd at the end, I expect better from you.
I've been in game with 2d over 3d and natedogg holder a few times, not once did anyone drop out on either team.
